titleStmt.title: Select cases of conscience touching vvitches and vvitchcrafts. By Iohn Gaule, preacher of the Word at Great Staughton in the county of Huntington.
titleStmt.author: Gaule, John, 1604?-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson for Richard Clutterbuck, and are to be sold at his house in Noblestreet,
